text: Foxcrete did a wonderful job from start to finish. We did a quick quote online and then decided we wanted to do something a little more detailed. I called and spoke with Blake and he walked me through all of the options. I then worked with Debra on scheduling. Debra also met me at a nearby home to show me a past job they had done to make sure I was 100% happy with the colors and style we picked out. Debra also came to our home for the color consultation. Everything was very smooth. Team arrived to form the patio and then a few days later Blake and team arrived to pour the concrete. He double checked with me and my husband every step of the way to make sure it was what we wanted. It turned out amazing and I wish we would have hired them sooner. We are already enjoying our patio so much and would absolutely recommend their services to others. Priced well, great communication, and great execution! Thank you, Foxcrete!

name: Andy Marr
text:
Foxcrete construction was one of the easiest, most professional and downright fastest companies my wife and I have ever worked with, and we have done a Ton of home alterations and improvements.

First of all, Josh is the guy to work with. He is professional, knows his craft, and came out to our house often. We wanted to put in a curved edge patio and he came out and measured the land, staked out the space and figured out what would work best. Our schedules didn't align at first but we made it work once we figured out a workable timeline. He came back a few more times and we discussed color of the concrete, size, dimensions, drainage, and a bunch of other details. He was patient and hear do us out, and you could tell he was excited about the project.

When the crew showed up they were fast, professional, and methodical. They know their craft. They worked from 6am to 7pm some days, going over the details, re-laying sod, cleaning up spills or little messes (nothing major just normal stuff from the construction), and generally just making the backyard look good again.

And the finished product is exactly what we wanted! Josh kept telling us to trust him, he had a plan, he was going to pour some creativity into our project and we wouldn't be disappointed. And he was right! Our once ugly backyard patio space now looks like something out of a magazine! The form is beautiful, it makes our yard flow, and it is just a fantastic job. I HIGHLY recommend these guys. They'll give you what you're looking for and their highlights and creative choices will only improve on your original idea! Great company, great employees, great final product! Thanks guys!

name: David Johnson
text: All the guys were very professional and very happy with the final product. Would highly recommend

text:
Foxcrete is highly recommended.
Called for a survey Saturday afternoon expecting a response later in the week. Received a call that same afternoon and had a survey scheduled early into the next week.
Josh was fantastic walking me through all my options and listening to my requirements. Received a quote meeting my specs in short order.
Installation is complete and could not be happier. Everyone on the crew starting with Blake and Scott to each and every helper, were courteous and caring for needs and my yard. They worked quickly and efficiently but most importantly left with me satisfied. My back patio and driveway extension could not have turned out better. The mess was minimal and where there was any issue, it was taken care of before the crew was finished.
I cannot thank Blake and Josh enough for the commitment to excellence they provided on my project.

name: Warren Wood
text:
Anyone looking for a concrete contracting company should not hesitate to contact Foxcrete Construction Group. They are an exceptional concrete contracting company that most definitely puts the customer first. They went way out of their way to ensure they had a satisfied customer with our project and believe me, we were not an easy customer to please. They had to continuously answer questions and listen to our concerns but did so with nothing but professionalism. They take pride in their work and have been very professional throughout the entire process!

We went with the stamped concrete design with colors to blend well with our brick. We were unsure of the colors and how they would look next to the brick on our house, but with their experience and knowledge they were able to give us what we wanted. The colors are as close to perfect as you can get!

We've never known anyone personally that had a stamped concrete patio or have ever viewed a stamped concrete patio of this design, other than in pictures, so fully understanding the process and the amount of work it takes to build a patio, such as this, was beyond our full comprehension. It takes a lot of work, skill and somewhat of an artistic eye along with exceptional pride to produce a nice product. Foxcrete did just that!

The patio is designed with the appeal of a paver patio, but without stones that will move. The brick lined edge comes down the side walls of the patio giving it a realistic appearance of brick pavers. The colors are a mixture of browns and tans, with the brick edge being a darker color than the inner area of the patio giving it a distinct framed look. We love this design and the colors!

Thank you, Josh and Foxcrete Construction Group, for doing such a fantastic job on this patio! The final product proves that you care and take extreme pride in the work you do!  It's a beautiful patio that I'm sure we will enjoy for many years to come!

text: Called this am for a quote on concrete staining in my 2600 Sq ft home.  Wife answered and advised they could come today, but we wouldn't be home, so then advised they would come on Sunday after "Church". Husband called back not even an hour later asking if my home was new or existing construction.  I advised existing, and explained to him my wood laminate had been damaged and we just received money from insurance company. He then told me that they are very picky about the jobs they take on and that they don't like to do existing construction because of the damage THEY could cause to cabinets, or walls. He advised me we would be too much trouble.  Kept saying how picky they are with taking on jobs...could it be that we are black and THAT'S the REAL reason?  Why didn't the Wife tell me this initially?  Guess we'll take our 15,000.00 elsewhere. Very bad customer service.

resp.text:

Sincerely Scott Henning

text:
Thank you FOXCRETE DESIGNS! I would highly suggest Foxcrete to anyone looking to get straight forward high quality concrete work.
We knew we wanted stained concrete floors prior to the start of our build however by the time it came to do floors there were SEVERAL issues with the concrete; footprints, broken out concrete, gouge marks, stains from red clay & cedar.  Our builder, Eric Craig Custom Homes (Fantastic builder/excellent experience) hired another company to score & stain the floors.  My husband & I stopped by the house during the scoring process from the first company and immediately stopped work & started brainstorming with our builder about other flooring options.  Eric had Blake from Foxcrete Designs come out & take a look at our "complex concrete job" & give us his professional opinion on the outcome of moving forward with stain/scored.  Blake walked us through the issue spots & his remedies for those areas & gave us his opinion on what the final outcome would look like; nervously we took a chance & so glad we did!  My floors look amazing, truly beautiful!  Blake/Foxcrete are a very professional service that take pride in their work.

resp.text:

Professionally yours,
Blake Henning

Thank you for the kind words; we sincerely appreciate your business, as well as your feedback. We strive to provide excellent customer service to our customers. Please let us know if you have additional landscape construction needs.

name: Mark Haughery
text: Right on time and Excellent work from start to finish.  Highly recommend Superiorscape!

Mr. Haughery:
Thank you for the kind words; we sincerely appreciate your business, as well as your feedback. SuperiorScape, Inc. strives to provide excellent customer service. Please let us know if you need additional landscape construction work completed.

name: Sarah Beth Wertz
text: We are beyond thrilled with our recent courtyard renovation by SuperiorScape. The guys worked hard, were professional and completed the project in just a few days. We were also really pleased that they took the time to clean up each day after a hard day of work. The process from start to finish was professional and easy. We highly recommend SuperiorScape!

resp.text: Thank you for your business, as well as your feedback. We strive to provide each customer with excellent customer service. Please let us know if you have any additional landscape construction projects; we will be happy to come out again.

name: phillip bromley
text: This company is outstanding. They came when they said they would and did excellent work.

resp.text:
Mr. Bromley:
Thank you for the kind words; we sincerely appreciate your business, as well as your feedback. SuperiorScape, Inc. strives to provide excellent customer service. Please let us know if you need additional landscape construction work completed.

name: Don Johnson
text: Love the work and the great group of guys

resp.text:
Mr. Johnson:
Thank you for the kind words; we sincerely appreciate your business, as well as your feedback. SuperiorScape, Inc. strives to provide excellent customer service. It is always good to hear that our team members are working to meet your expectations.

name: Jarrod Patterson
text:
1 star only because 0 stars is not an option.

I just moved to the Birmingham area. The only item needing attention from our home inspection was a failed retaining wall. SuperiorScape provided a quote for the repair, which we used to close on our house (had money held in escrow based on SuperiorScape's quote).

About a week prior to the scheduled start date for the work to begin, the sales agent came out with another team member to look at the existing wall. That afternoon, the sales agent called me and said that due to personnel issues they couldn't do the job. I tried to get back in touch with SuperiorScape to say we were willing to wait until they settled their personnel issues but that we would like them to honor the quote they gave us. They have not responded to any of my or my realtor's attempts to contact them.

I believe the sales agent misquoted the job, came out with the actual worker who told him it was too cheap, and rather than owning the mistake, talking it out, and honoring the quote they backed out of the job and refused to speak with me again.

Terrible customer service.

resp.text:
Mr. Patterson:
Although your review was posted in 2017, I would like to apologize for the experience you had with SuperiorScape, Inc. In March of 2018, we hired a new Sales Manager, with a great deal of knowledge in the landscape construction field. SuperiorScape, Inc. is dedicated to our customers and we strive to provide great customer service. I apologize for not being able to provide you with better service.

name: James E. Dean
text: Great People!

resp.text:
Mr. Dean:
Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate your help with our IT issues.

name: Sean Richards
text: We really enjoyed working with Bryan and team. The worked on building an outdoor kitchen, flagstone path and rebuilding flagstone steps. They delivered on their commitments to high quality and ensuring we were happy with the project completion before asking for payment. They communicate upfront in an effective and frequent manner. They also improved on the ideas we had for the project and brought their knowledge and experience to help us make decisions that made sense. If you are considering them for a project you won’t find any better. I’m now looking for more opportunities to work with them!!

name: Steven Pearl
text: Bryan and his team were fantastic to work with! They were responsive, hard working, professional and paid incredible attention to detail on the entire project. The completely exceeded our expectations as far as what the space would look like. What started as a boring backyard turned into a resort looking space that we never want to leave! Can’t thank Bryan and his team enough for delivering such a perfect outdoor space for us to enjoy!

name: Amanda Champion
text: We had an awesome experience with The Backyard Auburn.  Bryan's crew did an amazing job on our flagstone sidewalk and sitting area.  They were prompt, professional and worked nonstop to get the job done.  Will definitely use them again for future projects.

name: Lauren Mackey
text: The Backyard just completed 2 flagstone patios, with a rock bench, and firepit in our backyard. It turned out better than we ever expected! They were exceptional with quality, communication, and worked quickly while paying close attention to detail. You can tell they take pride in what they do. We previously had a flagstone path done by another company and the end products don't even compare. The Backyard's patio is definitely a far superior finish. We really enjoyed working with our job's Forman Kensley and all of his crew they were fantastic to work with! If you need someone to update your outdoor space, then I highly recommend The Backyard in Auburn!

name: Cynthia Waldrep
text: Excellent all around with outstanding service, communication and overall experience!  Brian and his team were awesome and easy to work with.  I called one afternoon to inquire about an outdoor stone fireplace and he was at my lake house the very next morning.  After sharing his ideas and his vision with me, we ended up adding an outdoor kitchen as well and I could not be happier!!  The price he quoted was reasonable and the work was done as specified in a timely manner.  So happy I found Brian and The Backyard and I will definitely use them again!

name: Eric Cross
text: Outstanding quality and service! Nothing but praise for the entire company. Brian and Kendall made this such an easy process. Highly recommend!

name: Steve Toledo
text: Brian the owner is amazing to work with. His stone is high quality and the delivery was simple and easy. 5 star overall very professional and would definitely use again!

name: Diana Catrett
text: Great work, would highly recommend The Backyard.  They know what they are doing and the crew that did the work were great.  They finished the job in one day.  That arrived at 7 am and worked non stop except for a lunch break.  Kensley was very polite and reassuring that if I had any questions I thought of later, not to hesitate to call.  After the job was complete, I received a phone call from Bryan Waites asking if I had any questions and if I was happy with the work.  Can't say enough good things about this company!

name: Bob Parker
text:
Every person at The Backyard has been a pleasure in the way they conduct their business. Extremely professional and courteous with their customers interest and satisfaction as the focus of their business. We just finished an expansion of our porch to a patio with a new stone surface throughout and the finished product is perfect.  Bryan listened to our requests and offered some excellent input that helped us with our final decision.
They arrived on time and stayed until all the work was finished. The cleanup of our yard was excellent as well as the front street and sidewalk after all was finished. The yard, including grass and flower beds were as if nothing had been disturbed.
We could not be more pleased from start to finish. Polite and respectful crew members and excellent, quality workmanship means we will call Bryan again for more work as we continue our landscaping plans.

name: R Blanchard
text: Hired Brian and his team to put in a patio and firepit to match our house on the lake.  Brian was patient as we tried to figure out the best way to situate the firepit.  He just completed the work and we couldn't be happier with the way it turned out.  Top quality work at a reasonable price.  Most importantly he communicated and showed up when he said he would.  Something I'm not use to living on the lake. Thanks again Brian. Highly recommend!

name: Molly Wilson
text: Love the new patio The Backyard installed today!  Already asked if they can install another one!  Very hardworking crew. I highly recommend them!

name: Brian Weiss
text: Bryan and his team at The Backyard of Auburn are absolutely the best in the business. Great communication, high attention to detail, and with a finished product that will WOW you for years to come. They completed a beautiful stone retaining wall with large stone steps up to our pool three years ago, and just last week capped our pool deck with stunning flagstone - breathtaking! This decision absolutely transformed our pool, and we cannot wait for family and friends to enjoy it with us. Bryan truly cares about his customers and stands by his work. We have "one more" project and with no hesitation it will be Bryan and his team with The Backyard.

name: Brittney Thaxton
text: Our patio was finished yesterday and to say we are extremely pleased would be an understatement!!! Everything was completed on time and at the amount we were quoted. We will definitely reach out to get our front porch done later this year. Completely blown away with how much this has refreshed our yard!!! I highly recommend The Backyard Auburn!!

name: Ken Tidwell
text: Bryan Waits of The Backyard has done 2 projects for us in the last year. They installed a short height but long rock wall and several rock planters along with a flagstone walkway on the first project. It was done on time and budget. The work was quality and looked wonderful. The second project that they just finished was another walkway from our deck to the fire pit. It turned out wonderfully just like the other one did. His guys are very professional and nice to work with. I would recommend them highly.

name: jen jones
text: I highly recommend Brian and Backyard Auburn. He listed to what our vision was and the finished patio is exactly what we wanted.

name: Hope Henderson
text: We had a patio and a wall built at our house.  Bryan and the crew did exactly as promised.  They came here and worked hard for three days and finished.  We love the new patio and wall!  It transformed the front of our house into something beautiful!  Thank you so much!  Hope and Mark

name: Chuck Isbell, M.D.
text: Bryan and his crew recently installed  this quarry stone wall for a raised flower bed in my sloped front yard. They got on the project quickly, completed it in a couple of hours, and the cost was very reasonable. The quality of workmanship is excellent and I am thrilled with the results. If I have any future work like this I know exactly who to call! I would recommend Bryan and his staff at The Backyard to anyone needing the services they provide.

name: latricia weatherford
text: Extremely amazing place. The owner actually took my call and came in on a Sunday to help us. Thanks so much Backyard!

name: David Shropshire
text: The Backyard in Auburn did a beautiful job laying stone over our existing concrete sidewalk, and extending our back patio. They are experts in working with natural stone, but I was equally impressed with the owner's (Bryan) commitment to customer service and follow-up to insure we were satisfied when the job was finished.

name: joe best
text: This company is top notch!  They did a superb job and cleaned up afterwards after putting in a Flagstone patio for us. They exceeded all of my expectations I closing being responsibly priced. Will use them again for any other projects!

name: Laura Kincaid
text: Bryan and his skilled team of professionals just completed a project for us that has exceeded our expectations in every way possible. The customer service and attention to detail are unmatched. The Backyard can completely transform your outdoor space. HIGHLY recommend!!

Bryan and his team are awesome.  It's incredible to watch them work, they are well oiled machine and produce awesome looking brick and stone work.

This is my third experience with Bryan and The Backyard Team.  Excellent communication, quality work and clean up after the job was complete.

name: Foster White Jr
text: Great place with great service.

name: Vicki Cross
text: Mr. Bryan, Thank you so much for the outstanding job you and your wonderful staff have provided to us! Everything is so beautiful!  I love it!  From the moment you and your staff arrived, we have received the most outstanding services anyone could have ever wanted!  Everyone was so courteous, kind and the most professionally organized organization I have ever experienced!  You were always on time and each individual worked hard to achieve the highest level of quality in service and production of product satisfaction!  I could infinitely go on about you, your staff and the BEAUTIFUL FIREPLACE AND PATIO you designed and built in my backyard!  You are the Chick Fil-A in masonry construction!!!   Chick-Fil-A is known for their quality in service and delicious food.  You, Sir, are second to none with your quality of service and product satisfaction!  Each of you are artist when it comes to your work product.  Your signature has been permanently engraved in the beautiful fireplace in my yard!!! Thank you so much for allowing me the honor to receive one of your beautiful fireplace/patio signatures pieces !  Again, thank you for everything!   May GOD BLESS each of you in every way!  Y’all are the greatest!

name: Debbie Smith
text: The Backyard crew installed a flagstone patio, walkway, and flowerbed surround for us and we couldn’t be happier!  The crew was very skilled, hard-working, careful and courteous and did a beautiful job. I highly recommend them for any such project!

Maria G.
Auburn

Way above my expectations,  Happy customer in Salem, Alabama.
Thank you!!☀️☀️

name: Theresa O'Steen

He has always been professional and easy to discuss what we wanted and his follow through has been excellent.  I highly recommend them.  I tried to do a patio once DIY style, big mistake.  Call Brian he's an artist with stone.

name: Chris Rehm, Sr.
text: I had Backyard Of Auburn do a project in my backyard in Auburn.. They did a fantastic job. We had kudzu and bamboo and erosion with a drainage ditch through the yard.  Brian and his crew cleared the yard tiered the yard and put down a tarp and rocks and in the drainage ditch large rock and it looks wonderful. I could not be more pleased. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Michael Scifres
text: Bryan and his guys did an astounding job at re-doing our covered patio. The old concrete was torn out and replaced with flagstone that looks amazing. All done in one day. Will definitely be using again in the future!

name: Philippe Scheys
text: Bryan and his crew are great to work with on projects to enhance your outdoor space. The end product is beautiful and professionally built, and in a very short time-frame!

name: Dane Griffith
text: I've worked with Bryan and The Backyard on three different projects.  They are always professional and the quality of their work is of the highest quality.  You can't go wrong with The Backyard!!

name: David Thomason
text: Brian was friendly and proactive. He called several days ahead of the appointed installation date to confirm and was onsite exactly on time. As a retired construction manager I appreciated the high quality of the workmanship. Brian also called to follow up after the work was done. I highly recommend The Backyard to anyone wanting stone work done.

name: James Long
text: Bryan and the folks at The Backyard were awesome! The prices were competitive and the quality was outstanding. I had them do a 290 square foot rock patio and I couldn't be happier. I would definitely use them again. Highly recommended!

name: Chris Kearns
text: Bryan and his crew haven't done a project for me lately, but at one time they rebuilt some entrance columns and a commercial sign for me a few years.  They looked good at the time, and they still look great years later.  Now they are doing outdoor kitchens too?  Maybe it's time for another project - a fun one.

name: Shannon Belletti
text: Drove 40 minutes to their store. Arrived over an hour before closing time and no one here. (Wednesday afternoon in June) Sign on door said to call for assistance. Tried calling twice but no answer and no way to leave a message.

name: Larry Wilson
text: Was in need of fireplace work and Backyard did a great job .

name: Jr Feild
text:
Brian Waits and the Backyard crew came to my house and completed a large flagstone patio for me.  His price was fair; their work was unbelievably quick and excellent!  The work was done on time and at the price Brian quoted.  I rate their work as 5 stars and we are very happy with our completed patio.

Junior Feild

name: D
text: Outstanding workmanship and looks great! I highly recommend The Backyard to anyone who wants it done right.

name: Cindy Fischer
text: Web site says Sat 8am till 2pm drove from Evergreen Al to a closed store!! 😠. You lost a sale I wont come back!

resp.text: We are very sorry for the miscommunication about our Saturday hours. We are not open on Saturdays in the winter, but the Google hours were not updated. If you'd be willing to try us again we would love to help in the future!

name: Gordon Banks
text:
>  I believe this company needs to improve its customer communications policies. They showed up late (without calling) to give me an estimate, and then showed up unannounced the day they came to work. But then things took a surprising turn..
>   They were hired to fell one tree and heavily trim the lower branches of another. To save money and to give me a project involving strenuous exercise, they were not required to do any cleanup work. When they asked about my cleanup plans, I mentioned using my ATV trailer to move the debris to the street for pickup by the city. At their suggestion I moved the trailer into the work area. Suddenly the logs and branches magically found their way onto the trailer until it was full, with the remainder piled neatly nearby. Despite not being paid for it, they worked hard to minimize the cleanup work remaining for me, a fat 74 year old retired soldier.
>  It was also interesting and entertaining to watch their tree climber work. He knew exactly where and how to make cuts to have the pieces fall right where he wanted them. And while 20+ feet up into the tree being trimmed, he asked me over and over what else I wanted cut. He never suggested being done until I was satisfied.
>   Finally, when the work was done, they did a last minute walk-around to check for any tools left behind, and to pick up more debris so I wouldn't have to.
>   The team's work (and work ethics) more than made up for the early communications problems. I highly  recommend Veterans Lawn Care for lawn and tree work.

resp.text: Mr. Banks, thank you Sir for taking the time out to give us such a detailed honest review! We take all feedback, positive and negative, so we can adjust fire accordingly. We did forget that we were supposed to text instead of calling but we will be more detailed in our system to prevent this. We are happy that you were satisfied with our work, our teams strive for these 5 Star jobs. We will be passing this review out to the team! Thank you for your business and mostly thank you for your military service!

name: Michele McQueeney
text:
The team did a great job of cleaning out the flower beds, pruning bushes, removing the ivy and overgrowth. I really appreciated them asking questions and making sure I was happy with the work being done.
I will be using them again and recommend them to others.

name: Jim Blake
text:
These guys are awesome. Highly knowledgeable, professional, hard working and a heck of a lot of fun to watch if you have the free time.

I had an oak tree that needed to come down. It was between the house, a garage and a driveway with a fence right under it. They had to take the whole tree down in pieces. It was a 3 day process.

I would recommend them for any difficult task because, THEY ARE UP TO IT!

name: Katrina Wintermyer
text: The owner was very nice and did our free estimate personally. The workers showed up and the work was done very quickly and effectively. I love my new yard. We got a full landscaping of our front yard and it was exactly what I envisioned.

resp.text: Ms. Wintermyer, Thank you for an awesome review! I will let the team know this, we appreciate your business!

name: Jeri H
text:
Wonderful experience with Jarom today.
Very professional & did a great job!!

name: Karen French
text: Thank you - Randy, David, and Joe for planting my beautiful 15 gal Cherry Laurels in my backyard to hide a fence. I will be back!!

resp.text: Mrs. French, we enjoyed your project and glad that you will get the green back drop that you were wanting! I'll will pass this feedback to the team. Thank you for taking time out to leave us such a positive review!

name: Emma Hammonds
text: It was good. Nice to mert some of the staff.

name: Hannah Moon
text: These guys are amazing! They cleaned up my flower beds, removed shrubs, and placed new mulch down. Ms. Moon,

We are so happy to hear this! Thank you for your review of our company and the team. If there is anything else you need please don't hesitate!

text: Veteran's Lawn Care & Landscaping did a fantastic job with our landscaping! They completed a rock border with landscaping rock and it looks really good, better than expected. Jacob, Amanda, and Randy were excellent to work with and we couldn't be happier! Thank you very much!

text: Veterans lawn care is by far the best lawn care company I have dealt with. Their employees are very courteous and through. text: First, I had tried contacting several lawn services to get estimates on my yard and even made plans with no- shows. Mrs. Viall,
Thank you for your positive review. You and your husband have been awesome customers of ours! I'll pass this on to our team and let them know we have another happy customer!

name: Joyner Livingston
text: Installed a French drain and restocked a flowerbed with new topsoil. Installed shrubs. Shortly after the shrubs were installed I asked them to take a look at one that looked like it was not going to make it. Shortly meaning a few weeks after. These were full grown very expensive shrubs and they've ignored my calls for almost a year now.

name: Spencer M
text:
I inquired into their services recently and was told that they wont be able to service my yard due to not being able to utilize push mow in the back yard of about 25x25 size, not very large at all. I asked/called (repeatedly) for a rep to come out and get with me to get an estimate, I wasn't even sure it needed to be pushed at all I just assumed given my gate size. I wanted someone, a supposed professional, to tell me what they thought. However, after just simply driving by quickly out front of my yard they surmised (and didn't actually call to follow up) that they wouldn't be able to service my yard. It must be nice that you have plenty of business that you can not only turn away potential new customers but also treat them poorly with poor follow through and lackluster effort. I understand the eb and flow of your operations and how you can't push mow entire yards. I wasn't sure that it required that and if it did I would of possibly still been interested in the front yard being serviced which can be completed with a riding mower. You should evaluate your business operations and how you portray the business as a veteran ran organization (with I'm assuming good order and discipline, integrity, and work ethic) because I don't see that in your company right now.

Again to be clear your representative that "stopped by" rolled by for 20 seconds (we are all working from home and I watched him) and surely couldn't have gathered a full sight picture. Which is weird because I asked  your office rep if I could safely talk with him (at distance) and was told that wouldn't be an issue, clear lack of follow through there as well. Also, I was interested in other services your company might have provided but in light of this entire process lacking professionalism and follow through I wouldn't be confident in ANY work you could provide. You (the owner) should take a reflective look at your operation, from the person that takes the calls to the rep that spent 20 seconds here from the road, and see where to improve.

resp.text: Mr. McGalliard, I appreciate you bringing this to my attention. I take all reviews (positive and negative) to help better our company and our operations. I will meet with the team and let them know how this has impacted our company. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to remedy this relationship!

name: Joy Watts
text:
The guys showed up and completed the job way faster than we could have ever expected. not only did they complete the job quickly, they were professional and efficient. They also did a heck of a clean-up job!
Update 5/11/20:
We initially gave them 5 stars because we thought they ground the tree stumps, per the estimate they gave, but their clean-up job actually just consisted of them putting a lot of brush over the stumps instead. We went out a couple of weeks later to work on leveling the area and realized that all three tree stumps were still there. I have sent an email and called and left a voicemail, and have heard nothing back from the company. I understand that companies get busy during this season but they responded rather quickly to secure the job and aren't responding at all now to complete it and it's quite frustrating. All I want is for them to complete the work they were paid to complete. Doesn't seem like too much to ask.
Update 7/1/2020:
We are still waiting for our stump grinding that was supposedly scheduled a month ago. Every time we call, we are told that we are on the stump grinding list, as if our job that has already been paid for does not take precedent over new jobs that are bringing in new income. Very disappointing to say the least.
7/2/2020: We were able to have the stump grinding completed today and everything looks much better. I believe that the coronavirus situation threw everything off and, with that being said, the company does do quality work. I do believe, however, I will wait until things are relatively back to normal before thinking about reaching out for any additional services.

resp.text: Mrs. Watts, I apologize about dropping the ball on getting your stumps removed. We somehow weren't tracking that this was included in your estimate. We have you scheduled!

name: Doug Bishop
text:
I am not one to leave reviews for anything but my situation warrants sharing for anyone searching for lawn service.

On 3/30/20 they mowed my lawn when it was too wet and left ruts in my lawn, my neighbors lawn and damaged my fence and down spout.
They did eventually come out to sod the ruts however my fence and downspout have not been fixed and have since stopped communicating.

4/13/20 - received an email stating that they have the damage report and “are working on fixing it”

4/27/20 - I offered to take care of the damage myself if they would mulch and/or lay sod in bare areas of my back yard. My offer was declined and again said they would repair the fence and downspout.

4/30/20 - scheduled to make repairs on 5/5/20

5/5/20 - no show with no communication until I asked why they didn’t come. Told they did not come due to rain and rescheduled for 5/13/20.

5/12/20 - sent text asking if they were still planning to come and never replied.

5/13/20 - no show with no communication

- Followed up with a phone call a few weeks ago (don’t recall the date) and was told I would get a call back to reschedule the work.

It is now 6/7/20 with no call back and no repairs

name: jwiswoss
text:
Today was the first cut and it looks fantastic!

Update: The last cut for my grass was back on 5/22. As of 7/11, they have not been to cut the grass. That is over a month and a half with no cut. I understand that there was some rain in June, but this is ridiculous. I’m not sure if they have too many customers or just forget my lawn. At first, back in June, I thought I missed an invoice and inquired about that. I didn’t get a direct answer, just that they were behind due to rain. This is unacceptable service.

We are glad to hear that we have another happy customer! Thank you for rating us!!

Update Response: I am sorry that  your lawn has been missed! I will look into this and get you taken care of. Sorry for any inconvenience we've caused.

name: Nina Wesley
text: I spent 2000.00 with these people last year to have bushes removed, new ones installed and to have a tree removed and replaced.  They require that they choose the items you want.  The crepe myrtle they installed in my yard last year is nothing but tree stems this year.  I have called several times and was told by Amanda she would have Micheal come by at a specified date and time and look at everything and discuss it with me .  On the scheduled day, i received a 'Health Check' email from Amanda explaining that Micheal had come by earlier than anticipated and then she went on to explain what he found regarding my tree and the bushs.  First off, if he came by, i did not know anything about it because he surely did not ring my doorbell; Secondly, if he did come by, he trespassed onto my fenced in backyard to look at the tree.  I find this highly unacceptable. When i called these people last year, the owner Jacob came out, whom i consider the 'money man."  i explained to him that i dont have a green thumb at all and need some kind of consultation regarding what i need to do to get my yard up to speed.  All he proceeds to do is write down how much everything is going to cost me without allowing someone who knows about horticulture to come out and discuss with me first about what would be the proper plants i need based on my unique environment. Needless to say, i'm back at the drawing board, trying to find a landscaper who will listen to my cries of help and actually help me.  I certainly will not spend another dime with these people at Veterans Lawn Care!!

resp.text:
Ms. Wesley,
I am sorry to hear about your tree and shrubs. I explained that not having a watering system on your property could have negative effects on your flowerbeds due to our hot summers with long periods of no rain. We don't have a horticulturist on our team yet but you did correspond with our master gardener who provided you with options available at our local nurseries. We strive to achieve superior results in the Green Industry and I apologize your unhappy with our services. Please call us if we can make it right.
Very Respectfully,
-Jacob Leavitt

name: Tara Jean
text: This business bills for lawncare services they don’t provide! They are weeks behind on lawn services,  they do a horrible job edging and miss huge patches of grass. The receptionist is a horrible person, she’s nasty and rude to customers who call with questions about missed and scheduled services. Once she found out I was a Veteran she knew she couldn’t use the Veteran card as a crutch and an excuse for a poorly run business. They make excuse after excuse because they can’t keep up with their clients or even keep a schedule. Get your lawncare from any other provider!

resp.text: Ma'am we apologized for this and have done what we can to make this right.

name: Monica Snyder
text: As the neighbor of someone who used this company, I cannot speak of their services, but I can certainly attest to the lack of professionalism. While they were cutting my neighbors trees, part of one fell on part of my fence and damaged it. I was not upset, and as I told the owner, I understand, accidents happen. However, he wanted to do a patch job on my fence and I felt the length of the fence should be replaced to keep the fence uniform instead of part of it sticking out like a sore thumb, as was confirmed with my insurance company. So because he thought I was unreasonable he would not give me his insurance info. Poor business practices. Beware if you ever have issues with him, although I still appreciate his service to our country,I will at least give credit for that.

resp.text: Ms. Snyder, we attempted to repair the damaged fence with matching or new fencing but thought it was unreasonable to replace the entire fence line. Your husband and I agreed on what repairs were needed hours before your arrival. You then, approached irate by cussing and yelling at me in front of my employees. You stated that your adjuster would be in contact with us and I was willing to speak to him cordially but refused to engage any further especially after your husband started yelling with his fist clenched. We remained professional and courteous even while you were making a scene on our jobsite. I'm sorry that your fence was damaged and we are waiting to be contacted by your adjuster to see how we can move forward.

name: Paul Scott
text:
1) Guy who answered my initial call didn’t realize he’d already answered, and I heard him angrily cursing yet another phone call before he greeted me.
2) Hired this company for a bi-weekly service. Said they did my area on Friday only, and they didn’t do make-ups for rain. Ok, cool.
3) They never showed. First Friday, no rain, no mow. Second Friday, no rain, no mow. They didn’t get a third Friday.
4) Gave 2 stars for being vet owned

resp.text:
Mr. Scott,

I am unsure if you have the correct company. I checked our system and cannot find your name. There is other companies with a deceiving similar name as ours in Huntsville. We also have designated days for rain makeups as well. If you could please give us a call and we can discuss any issues you may have.

Thank you sir!

Jacob Leavitt
Owner, Veteran's Lawn Care & Landscaping
Office: 256-812-9029

name: Chris Nimmo
text: Just bought a new home in Athens and needed help getting the landscaping and yard squared away. Called a few of the top rated companies on google and could not get a call back. Then Tahj and Pedro rolled by the house one day and handed me a pamphlet. I called them up and Mike responded quickly. Amanda at the office made the scheduling and transaction a breeze. Tahj and Dan started work promptly the day of the project and hammered out most of the clean out before lunch. After lunch Eric and Pedro joined the team and the entire crew finished the job. In 10 hours they had completely cleaned out and dug-up/removed the weeds and 12 over grown bushes from the front, back, and side beds, removed 5 stumps, cleaned out an over grown play area and had taken out 2 dying trees. By night fall, they had the yard mulched and ready for phase 2 - replanting in the spring. The following morning Tahj dropped by to mow the grass and edge the entire property, just as he had promised. You can tell Tahj gave a damn, and treated the place like his own. Eric brought the knowledge and had no problem answering my questions about plants and things while they worked. Pedro kept them honest, while Dan provided the laughs. As a veteran I appreciated that from all the guys. The price was fair for the work performed and worth every penny to us. Thank you guys for your service and for the service. Look forward to the next few phases in the coming months.

resp.text:
Mr. Nimmo, thank you so much for this review! I appreciate you taking the time to go into detail how hard our teams work in the field and in operations. These guys deserve the recognition and our customers deserve the best service possible! Thank you for your military service and sacrifice! We are happy to have another awesome customer to provide services to.
-Jacob Leavitt
